textSilder: This is a monitoring platform for compliance with Sustainable Development Goal 4
slide1: SRIE is a platform for the query, visualization and divulgation of the status of the main educational indicators in the countries of the Central American and Caribbean region.
slide2: It is conceived as a transparency tool around the commitment to comply with the goals of the Central American Educational Policy (PEC 2013-2030) and Goal 4 of the 2030 Agenda of Sustainable Development Goals.
